name: Lyle D. DeHAVEN and Ann DeHaven, his wife, Appellants, v. The PEOPLES NATURAL GAS COMPANY v. CASTLE GAS COMPANY, INC.
name_abbreviation: DeHaven v. Peoples Natural Gas Co.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
parties: Lyle D. DeHAVEN and Ann DeHaven, his wife, Appellants, v. The PEOPLES NATURAL GAS COMPANY v. CASTLE GAS COMPANY, INC.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David C. Serene, Serene & Serene, Indiana, For Peoples Natural Gas Co.
Wayne A. Kablack, Simpson & Kablack, Indiana, for Castle Gas Co., Inc.
casebody.head_matter:
605 A.2d 330
Lyle D. DeHAVEN and Ann DeHaven, his wife, Appellants, v. The PEOPLES NATURAL GAS COMPANY v. CASTLE GAS COMPANY, INC.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 12, 1992.
Decided April 16, 1992.
Michael Handler, Indiana, for appellants.
David C. Serene, Serene & Serene, Indiana, For Peoples Natural Gas Co.
Wayne A. Kablack, Simpson & Kablack, Indiana, for Castle Gas Co., Inc.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
